import React from 'react'; import { ManagementToolNav, BasicInput } from '../../../common/components' import Icon from '@material-ui/core/Icon'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; function MyProfileTemplate(props) { const { isOwner, form, users, items, categories, company, navigateDashboard } = props.viewStore; debugger return (

My profile

{isOwner ?

Total users: {users.data.length}

Total items: {items.data.length}

Total categories: {categories.data.length}
:

Company name: {company.data.name}

Company address: {company.data.address}

Company city: {company.data.city}
}
) } export default MyProfileTemplate;
